forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine early then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
